sentences.en: Admission is free for children under 9.
sentences.cn: 九岁以下儿童免费入场。

sentences.en: All students are offered free accommodation.
sentences.cn: 所有学生都免费住宿。

sentences.en: All the ferries carry bicycles free or for a nominal charge.
sentences.cn: 所有的渡船都免费或以极低的收费运载自行车。

sentences.en: As its rider tried to free it, the horse kicked out.
sentences.cn: 骑手想松开那匹马时，它乱踢乱蹬。

sentences.en: Buyers use different ruses to wring free credit out of their suppliers.
sentences.cn: 买主们千方百计想从供货商那儿无息赊购。

sentences.en: Children these days have very little free time .
sentences.cn: 现在的孩子很少有空闲时间。

sentences.en: Firemen tried to free the injured and put out the blaze.
sentences.cn: 消防队员努力救出伤者并扑灭大火。

sentences.en: Free room and board are provided for all hotel staff.
sentences.cn: 宾馆的所有员工都可享受免费膳宿。

sentences.en: He knew he could be free in as little as three years.
sentences.cn: 他知道只要再过三年他就能自由了。

sentences.en: He walked out of the courtroom a free man .
sentences.cn: 他从法庭走出来，成了自由人。

sentences.en: He was found not guilty and walked free from the court.
sentences.cn: 他被判无罪，当庭释放。

sentences.en: he'll have something to say about your making free with his belongings.
sentences.cn: 你擅自动用他的个人财物，他有话要说。

sentences.en: Hundreds of dogs roam free on the streets.
sentences.cn: 成百上千条狗在街上随意游荡。

sentences.en: I could see the young boy struggling to free himself.
sentences.cn: 我看到小男孩正在奋力挣脱。

sentences.en: I’m free next weekend.
sentences.cn: 下个周末我有空。

sentences.en: people have been having a free ride, paying so little rent that there is no money for maintenance.
sentences.cn: 人们一直在占便宜，只付很少租金以至于没有钱搞维修。

sentences.en: Send for our free information pack for more details.
sentences.cn: 欲知详情，请来函索取我们的免费信息包。

sentences.en: Some cases of arthritis respond to a gluten-free diet.
sentences.cn: 无麸质饮食对一些关节炎患者有疗效。

sentences.en: The animals are allowed to run free in the park.
sentences.cn: 那些动物可以在公园里自由奔跑。

sentences.en: The service covers contraceptive advice and health checks, and is available free.
sentences.cn: 服务项目包括避孕建议和健康检查，并且免费提供。

sentences.en: The shark was writhing around wildly, trying to get free.
sentences.cn: 鲨鱼拼命挣扎，试图逃脱。

sentences.en: There’s a special free gift with this month’s magazine.
sentences.cn: 本月杂志附赠特别礼物。

sentences.en: these professionals were giving their time for free.
sentences.cn: 这些专业人员在抽时间提供无偿服务。

sentences.en: They broke free and made off in a stolen car.
sentences.cn: 他们挣脱后开着一辆偷来的车逃之夭夭。

sentences.en: They have called on the government to set all political prisoners free .
sentences.cn: 他们呼吁政府释放所有政治犯。

sentences.en: They took the only free table, which was just inside the door.
sentences.cn: 他们在刚进门处的唯一一张空桌子边坐下。

sentences.en: We all believe in good,free education for our children.
sentences.cn: 我们都相信对我们孩子们的良好的、自由的教育。

sentences.en: We'll put together a proposal, including detailed costings, free of charge.
sentences.cn: 我们将免费拟一份提案，其中包括详细的成本估算。

sentences.en: What I did for you was free, gratis, you understand?
sentences.cn: 我为你所做的一切都是免费的，无偿的，你明白吗？

sentences.en: With one leap he was free!
sentences.cn: 这一跳他就自由了！

sentences.en: Would Bethany return of her own free will, as she had promised?
sentences.cn: 贝萨妮会像她承诺的那样自愿回来吗？

sentences.en: You get a big salary incentive and free board and lodging too.
sentences.cn: 你们能获得大笔激励性薪水，还可享受免费膳宿。

words.tran_cn: 自由地；免费地；大量地；慷慨地；直率地
使自由；解放（free的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 自行处理权；自主权；全权；放手干的权力
自由访问；自由存取；自由入口
没有义务的；没有牵连的
adj. 无…的；摆脱…的；在…外面
离岸价格；船（或火车）上交货；装船（或装火车）免费
这里是自由国家（用于声称做某事不违法或不受禁止，常有辩解之意）
自由世界（统指以前反对苏联集团的非共产主义国家）

trans.tran_cn: 免费的，自由的，免税的，空闲的，未被占用的，松开的，慷慨的，
trans.tran_en: not held, tied up, or kept somewhere as a prisoner
to allow someone to leave prison or somewhere they have been kept as a prisoner
